about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Recently graduated from Oulu University of Applied Sciences, where I completed my degree in Computer Engineering. My academic career has equipped me with a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end development.
about.paragraph2: I enjoy building applications that are not only functional but also pleasant to use. I am particularly interested in full-stack development and love the process of turning ideas into reality.
about.paragraph3: Outside of coding, I'm a pretty laid-back person who gets along with everyone. I like to unwind by playing video games, watching football or racing. My girlfriend and I have two cats that definitely make things interesting. I believe staying curious and having fun outside of work helps me stay sharp and creative in what I do.

items.title: Bachelor's Thesis
items.description: This thesis explores the development of a headless e-commerce web application, focusing on the use of Shopify Hydrogen, a modern framework for building customizable, scalable online stores.
